contentrichtext.text: '''[[Florence]]''' is the capital city of the region of Tuscany, Italy. '''Florence''' may also refer to: In '''geography''': * [[Florence, Nova Scotia]], Canada * Florence Airport, also called [[Peretola Airport]], [[Florence]], Italy * [[Florence, Alabama]], United States * [[Florence, Arizona]], United States * [[Florence, Colorado]], United States ** [[ADX Florence]], a supermax prison in Florence, Colorado * [[Florence, Illinois]], United States * [[Florence, Indiana]], United States * [[Florence, Kansas]], United States * [[Florence, Kentucky]], United States * [[Florence, Massachusetts]], United States * [[Florence, Minnesota]], United States * [[Florence, Mississippi]], United States * [[Florence, Missouri]], United States * [[Florence, Montana]], United States * [[Florence, Nebraska]], United States * [[Florence, New Jersey]], United States * [[Florence, New York]], United States * [[Florence, Madison County, Ohio]], United States * [[Florence, Oregon]], United States ** [[Florence Municipal Airport]], Florence, Oregon * [[Florence, South Carolina]], United States ** [[Florence Regional Airport]], Florence, South Carolina * [[Florence, South Dakota]], United States * [[Florence, Texas]], United States * [[Florence, Vermont]], United States * [[Florence (CDP), Wisconsin]], United States * [[Florence (town), Wisconsin]], United States In '''people''': <!-- DO NOT ADD OTHER PEOPLE HERE UNLESS THEY ARE KNOWN BY THE NAME "FLORENCE" ALONE. INSTEAD, ADD NOTABLE PEOPLE TO THE LISTS AT [[Florence (name)]] --> * [[Florence (given name)]], a given name (including a list of people with the name) *Florence, main character in the children's television programme ''[[The Magic Roundabout]]'' *[[Florence (actor)]], stage name of Nicolas-Joseph Billot de La FerriÃ¨re (1749-1816), French actor *[[Florence of Worcester]], medieval chronicler <!-- DO NOT ADD OTHER PEOPLE HERE UNLESS THEY ARE KNOWN BY THE NAME "FLORENCE" ALONE. INSTEAD, ADD NOTABLE PEOPLE TO THE LISTS AT [[Florence (name)]] --> '''Other''': * [[Hurricane Florence (disambiguation)]] *"Florence", a poem by Patti Smith from her 1994 book ''[[Early Work]]'' *[[Florence and the Machine]], a British indie band * SS ''Florence'', a stern-wheel steamer converted into the gunboat [[USS Curlew (1862)|USS ''Curlew'' (1862)]] * [[Republic of Florence]] ==See also== * [[Florence County (disambiguation)]] * [[Florence Township (disambiguation)]] * [[Florence-Graham, California]] * [[New Florence (disambiguation)]] * [[Sainte-Florence (disambiguation)]] {{disambig|geo}} <!-- -->
